summary: A new quest for Skyrim when finished allows the player to easily teleport between a location outside of Ivarstead and High Hrothgar which allows the player to get to High Hrothgar without having to go up and down the 7000 steps every time.
descriptionHtml:
A new quest for Skyrim when finished allows the player to easily teleport between a location outside of Ivarstead and High Hrothgar which allows the player to get to High Hrothgar without having to go up and down the 7000 steps every time. To start the quest you need to have somewhat completed the [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:The_Horn_of_Jurgen_Windcaller]The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller[/url] quest and approach a Nord named Sittar the Tired in Ivarstead who would be at the end of the bridge that leads to the 7000 steps. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18676]here[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
